articles.content:

articles.title: The Highland haven insulated from rising energy prices - BBC
articles.description: A hydroelectric scheme provides power for the 120 people living in the remote community of Knoydart.
articles.content:
Scotland's last great wilderness seems an unlikely haven from the energy crisis gripping the nation.
Knoydart is one of the most rugged and remote parts of the British Isles, accessible only by boat… [+5769 chars]
